title: Mercurii, 15. Iunii. 1642. Ordered by the Lords in Parliament, that these particulars shall be forthwith printed and published.
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
publisher: Printed for Joseph Hunscott, and John Wright,
notes: Various orders relating to the Militia.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Orders to print signed: Io. Brown, Cleric. Parliamentorum.
